metadata.title: CVE-2017-6059 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Mod_auth_openidc.c in the Ping Identity OpenID Connect authenticationmodule for Apache (aka mod_auth_openidc) before 2.14 allows remoteattackers to spoof page content via a malicious URL provided to the user,which triggers an invalid request.

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-openidc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
